H0.text: Who was the first Pope to be appointed in the 21st century. Pope John Paul II

H1.text: Who was the first Pope to be appointed in the 21st century. Pope Benedict XV

H2.text: Who was the first Pope to be appointed in the 21st century. Pope Pius XII

H3.text: Who was the first Pope to be appointed in the 21st century. PB16

A5.text: Following the death of John Paul II on 2 April 2005

A8.text: Pope John Paul II was head of the Catholic Church and sovereign of the Vatican City from 16 October 1978 until his death in 2005.
